description: This is the data dictionary for the Sentinel SCDM Snapshot Program. This includes data dictionaries for datasets output to the msoc and dplocal subdirectories.

msoc.name: msoc
msoc.description: These datasets are output to the msoc directory. Datasets found in the MSOC directory are returned to SOC.

datasets.description: Frequency of length of enrollment spans by record for members with medical and drug coverage.

notes.text: Data Partner ID populated using Common Components macro variable DP

variables.description: Count of records by length of enrollment.
variables.label: Record Count

datasets.description: Frequency of total length of enrollment span in days by unique PatID.

notes.text: Data Partner ID populated using Common Components macro variable DP
tLOE=sum(Enrollment.Enr_End - Enrollment.Enr_Start +1) per unique Enrollment.Patid whereEnrolllment.MedCov='Y' and Enrollment.DrugCov='Y'.

variables.description: Count of unique Enrollment.PatID per tLOE
variables.label: Enrollee Count

datasets.description: Number of PatIDs with at least one day of medical and drugcoverage by year.

notes.text: Data Partner ID populated using Common Components macro variable DP

variables.description: Count of unique PatID by year
variables.label: PatID count by year

datasets.description: Number of PatIDs with at least one day of medical and drug coverage.
Number of actively enrolled patients as of a Data Partner's overall maximum date for data completeness (DP_MaxDate).

variables.description: Based on macro variable &dp_maxdate (created by common components)
Count of unique PatID where last enrollment.Enr_End ge DP_MaxDate
variables.label: Active Enrollee Count

datasets.description: Age distribution of all PatIDs with at least one day of medical and drug coverage. Age reflective of the member's first day of enrollment of most recent enrollment span.

variables.description: An input table will be used to specify these values

datasets.description: Age distribution of actively enrolled PatIDs with at least one day of medical and drug coverage. Age reflective of the member's first day of enrollment based on their active enrollment span.

variables.description: An input table will be used to specify these values
Count of unique PatID where last enrollment.Enr_End ge DP_MaxDate
variables.label: Active Enrollee Count

datasets.description: Distribution of sex for members that have at least one span of medical and drug coverage.
Distribution of Hispanic status for members that have at least one span of medical and drug coverage.
Distribution of race for members that have at least one span of medical and drug coverage.

values.value_map: Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander

datasets.description: Distribution of geographic location (state-level) for members that have at least one span of medical and drug coverage.

variables.description: Geographic Location (2-letter uppercase US state abbreviation, '00' for missing zip, '99' for invalid zip values, and 'OT' for Other)
variables.label: Geographic Location

notes.text: American Samoa (AS), Micronesia (FM), Guam (GU), Marshall Islands (MH), Northern Mariana Islands (MP), Puerto Rico (PR), Palau (PW) and U.S. Virgin Islands are aggregated as OT

values.value_map: U.S. Overseas Territories and Freely Associated States

datasets.description: Number of dispensings per member, while actively enrolled in medical and drug coverage.
Number of dispensings per member, while actively enrolled in drug coverage.
Number of encounters per member, while actively enrolled in medical and drug coverage.
Number of laboratory result records per member, while actively enrolled in medical and drug coverage.
Number of members with at least one vital sign measurement, per type (height, weight, systolic BP, diastolic BP), while actively enrolled in medical and drug coverage.

notes.text: Valid Values: HGT=Height, WGT=Weight, SYS=Systolic, DIA=Diastolic

datasets.description: Number of enrollment spans per member, while actively enrolled in medical and drug coverage.
Number of death records for members that had at least one span of medical and drug coverage (active or inactive at time of death).
Number of death records for members that had at least one span of medical coverage (active or inactive at time of death).
Number of Cause of death (COD) records by members that had at least one span of medical and drug coverage (active or inactive at time of death).
Number of Cause of death (COD) records for members that had at least one span of medical coverage (active or inactive at time of death).
Mother-infant linkage (MIL) stratified by mother's age at delivery, encounter type, year, birth_type, and overall.
